Map Adjacency Information (3x3, 6x6, 8x8, 10x10, 20x20, 30x30)

3x3

0 3 6
1 4 7
2 5 8

0 -> 1, 4, 3
1 -> 0, 3, 4, 5, 2
2 -> 1, 4, 5
3 -> 0, 1, 4, 7, 6
4 -> 0, 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8
5 -> 2, 1, 4, 7, 8
6 -> 3, 4, 7
7 -> 6, 3, 4, 5, 8
8 -> 5, 4, 7
